parameter.name: lightId
parameter.label: Sensor ID
parameter.description: The identifier that is used within the hue bridge.

parameter.name: tholddark
parameter.label: Threshold Dark
parameter.description: Threshold the user configured to be used in rules to determine insufficient lightlevel (ie below threshold). Default value 16000

parameter.name: tholdoffset
parameter.label: Threshold Offset
parameter.description: Threshold the user configured to be used in rules to determine sufficient lightlevel (ie above threshold). Specified as relative offset to the “dark” threshold. Shall be >=1. Default value 7000
